programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys mouth off to patients in a dentist's office, toss popcorn at movie goers in a theater, and take photos for their outrageous blogs in a public park.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 4
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys polish their skills as manicurists in an unsuspecting nail salon, get touchy feely with patrons in a comic book store, and race through the aisles of a grocery store.

programme.title: Friends S4 10
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship. Chandler tries to get a date for Rachel. Monica schemes to establish authority at her new restaurant job.

programme.title: Friends S4 11
programme.desc: Phoebe's half-brother makes an astounding announcement he has married his older girlfriend and wants Phoebe to be a surrogate mother for them. Joey finds himself in a class struggle at Ross' museum.

programme.title: Friends S4 12
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out whether she is pregnant or not. A simple challenge escalates into a full-blown contest between the guys and the women.

programme.title: Friends S4 13
programme.desc: Rachel schemes to get a handsome client to ask her on a date. Chandler's jealousy causes problems with his girlfriend.

programme.title: Friends S4 14
programme.desc: Joey has no time to shower after he comes home from a three-day fishing trip and has to head out to the set of Charlton Heston's new movie.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 13
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In The Carbonaro Effect, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 1
programme.desc: Michael stuns customers in a holistic store by treating them to kale cannolis that are too good to be true. Later, while working in a toy store, Michael shocks his coworker by bringing a large teddy bear to life.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 2
programme.desc: Michael confuses variety store customers with products that have secret hideaways; astonishes camping store patrons with rafts that come in pill form; and convinces a woman that a tiny propeller enables human levitation.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 3
programme.desc: Michael tests gravity when he floats the idea of astronaut snacks; his darkness-triggering popcorn is too newfangled for one movie goer; and he astonishes an antique store employee with glass figurines that feel emotion and repair themselves!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 4
programme.desc: Michael stumps a delivery man by pulling live crabs out of a Chinese food order and leaves a mother and daughter in disbelief by using a spinning bowl to extract peanuts from candy. Plus, he puts one man in a serious ethical dilemma.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 1
programme.desc: Sheldon flees back to Texas in disgrace when he learns that the guys tampered with his arctic expedition data -- threatening Leonard's hopes for a romantic encounter with Penny.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 2
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first hookup, while Sheldon and Howard (SIMON HELBERG) stake their best comic books on a bet to determine an insect species.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 3
programme.desc: Howard and Raj (series star KUNAL NAYYAR) visit a Goth nightclub to pick up women, while Sheldon attempts to build a better Penny using chocolate-based behavior modification.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 4
programme.desc: Raj must find a new job or be sent back to India. Sheldon, however, has a solution -- which leaves Leonard and Penny dealing with Howard as third wheel.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 07
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin give tips on skipping a busy lunch line with a new Gaming the System hack, the Pitchman has some money-saving advice for your car, and ever wonder where high heels come from? Find out in Hacks From History.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 08
programme.desc: We're going to the future with Kevin as he lives out his hoverboard dream with Master Hacker Science Bob. And move over, 2000 thread count sheets, Brooke and Kevin spot a hack that will help your sheets feel like a million bucks!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 24
programme.desc: It's an end and a beginning in part 2 of the series finale, as Penny & Leonard try to keep a secret, Raj makes a new friend, and the gang travels together into an uncharted future.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Conflicted and misunderstood, Hancock is not your everyday superhero. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Idyllic life of a couple was disturbed when they find out that their neighbours have been contracted to kill them.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 2
programme.desc: Thony attempts to sever ties with the crime syndicate when the FBI comes asking questions, but when her sons health declines, she crosses a moral line, getting deeper involved.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 3
programme.desc: While Thony (Elodie Yung) is given a dire ultimatum by Garrett that could compromise her sons access to medical care, Arman calls into question his real role within the family.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 4
programme.desc: Facing a heartbreaking setback with Lucas treatment, Thony turns to Arman (ADAN CANTO) for help, who escalates the situation to get results.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 5
programme.desc: When Garrett (Oliver Hudson) puts Thony in a threatening position, she must choose between her loyalty to Arman and saving Fiona (Martha Millan) from deportation.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 21
programme.desc: With another victim found, Sharon focuses on former LAPD detective Mark Hickman (JASON GEDRICK). Fritz (JON TENNEY) and his team help the LAPD show up in force at a funeral.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 22
programme.desc: More information pours in about victims from the past and how they tie to the murders of the present. Lt. Cooper (MALCOM-JAMAL WARNER) and Amy Sykes get caught in a gun fight.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 23
programme.desc: In the gripping season finale, the threads of seven murders are tied together as the video wire on Reverend Price (TARIK LOWE) elicits admissions, narrowing the field of suspects.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 1
programme.desc: On the fifth season premiere, Jane tries to decipher Red John's connection with Lorelei (EMMANUELLE CHRIQUI) while the CBI team is forced to partner with the FBI to solve a murder.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 2
programme.desc: While the CBI team investigates the murder of a diamond cutter, Jane meets a girl who claims to be his late daughter, Charlotte (guest star DOVE CAMERON).

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 6
programme.desc: While Missy asks some uncomfortable questions about sex in church, Meemaw and Georgie go into business together.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 7
programme.desc: Sheldon takes his first engineering class with Professor Boucher (Lance Reddick). Also, Meemaw and Dale help take care of his ex-wife, June (Reba McEntire).

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 7
programme.desc: Thonys marital issues are amplified when Marco (Ivan Shaw) starts asking tough questions. Meanwhile, Arman is determined to make his way out from under Hayak.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 3
programme.desc: When a bank employee is murdered during a heist, Jane and the team get to work to track down the killer. Meanwhile, Lisbon is dragged deeper into the CBI/FBI rivalry.

programme.title: The Closer S7 15
programme.desc: In the winter finale, the federal lawsuit against Brenda comes to a head, and Brenda's lawyer (MARK PELLEGRINO) and the Baylor family lawyer (CURTIS ARMSTRONG) face off in court.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 6
programme.desc: While Missy asks some uncomfortable questions about sex in church, Meemaw and Georgie go into business together.

programme.desc: The big tension of the day is between T Money and Brandon. T goes for the mystery bins -- the box and the barrels. The antique gun he finds has been altered, so he needs to find out if it's worth anything.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 4
programme.desc: Papa Bear is back, and he's bigger than ever. He goes for a pair of mysterious blue shipping cases. Brandon and Lori find a 3 D printer, but have no idea what it does or how much it's worth until they take it to get appraised. What they find out amazes them.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 5
programme.desc: This week, Michael stuns shoppers at a thrift mart with a remarkably advanced antique that self-tailors clothes and a chalkboard that solves mathematical equations. And at a hardware store, a DIYer is left questioning the intelligence of beetles that follow blueprints and unscrew nuts and bolts. Plus, one woman is shocked and bewildered when Michael disappears and reappears before her very eyes.

programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin meet their toughest challenge yet when they use hacks to game a polygraph test, and it gets hot and heavy in the OR when Dr. Hack meets the fiery new CEO. Plus, Kevin learns how to defend himself with a smartphone.

programme.desc: Like Ghosts - The Hailstones produce an original work of Inupiaq art, and Cole Sturgis ventures into the wilds of the Southeast on a life-or-death hunt.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Healthy Inside - Dr Michael Mosley tries to learn the secrets behind staying healthy. He examines ways that people can make their bodies better at fighting infection and sickness.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Vacuum Cleaners - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey reveal the secrets behind production on an epic scale. This time they discover how a humble but hardy 'Henry' the vacuum cleaner is produced.

programme.title: Wild Japan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hokkaido - The northern island of Hokkaido swings from Siberia-like winters to Mediterranean-like summers. Everything living on Japan's wildest island needs to be extra resilient to survive.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - The Ocean is a beautiful and mysterious place but as our Spies discover, trouble can lie just below the surface.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep2

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Russia - Mount Elbrus - Located in Russia along the border with Georgia, Mount Elbrus offers true wilderness and some of the most dramatic landscapes on offer. One can never under-estimate its dangers, as weather in the region is famously dangerous.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Healthy Inside - Dr Michael Mosley tries to learn the secrets behind staying healthy. He examines ways that people can make their bodies better at fighting infection and sickness.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Ice Cream - Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman look at Britain's history with ice cream, and see it produced on an epic scale.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heart of The Dragon - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Japan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Joanna's epic journey comes to an end on the idyllic beaches of Kohama, one of Japan's most remote pacific islands - and home to a 'girl band' with an average age of 84.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Ice Cauldron - Volcano expert Chris Horsley is still in Iceland to check out Katla, one of Europe's largest and most deadly volcanos, which is overdue an eruption.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Philippines - Robson visits some of the 7000 islands of the Philippines, and although it is a paradise the local fish are powerful, aggressive and stubborn.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rules of the Game - Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Invaders from the Deep - As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snake Prison Island - Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March of the Crabs - On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planets biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africas east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rules of the Game - Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Devils - For Tasmanian devils, dominance is the name of the game during mating season. Meet males who fight for the right to pass on their genes, and learn about the violent, noisy etiquette of these carnivorous marsupials mealtime.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Crossing the Danakil - The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planets biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africas east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep1

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep2

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rules of the Game - Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Goby Effect - The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Child of Fire - For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Vietnam: Life in the Delta - The final country on the Mekongs journey is the home of the rivers mighty delta. A large deposit of rich nutrients carried downstream from hundreds of kilometres makes this region, the jewel of Vietnams crown, a biological treasure trove.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Vietnam: the Journey's End - The Mekong Delta is one of the largest on Earth. Formed over the last 8000 years, it fans out and discharges into the South China Sea via nine channels. These channels split and shape the coastline, creating unique habitats for a variety of animals.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wombat Wood - In the cool highlands near Australias Snowy Mountains is Wombat Wood. There, dotted amongst the trees and dense foliage, are over a hundred wombat burrows. But when some of the burrows are flooded, the wombats need to find safety.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Joey's Journey - Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, whos trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Family - Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies and raising them is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Infestation - Uninvited guests. Using sheer numbers to claim a territory, some animal groups are considered pests. But their very survival may depend on finding a home where theyre not welcome.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Migration - Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter or a mate. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds even thousands of individuals.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep3

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.desc: Bad Reputations - Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Gates of Hell - Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Niagara - Stretching more than 700 kilometers through the wilds of Ontario, the Niagara Escarpment Biosphere Reserve begins with the mighty Niagara Falls and winds its way through deep valleys and caves, pristine waterfalls, rolling hills and spectacular 500-meter-high cliffs.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Wines New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Eriks head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mias life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Savanna - The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether its head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India - Welcome to India a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.desc: Building On Borrowed Time - A client's project seems ideal a converted home with high-end finishes. But the pressure is on when a one-year deadline is set to get the job done.

programme.desc: To ADU Or Not To ADU - Tarek shows an over-designing flipper how to make cost-conscious designs that will keep his profit margin intact.

programme.title: Home In A Heartbeat With Galey Alix S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Casa Blanca - Two years ago, Galey completed renovations for a couple. Now they have two children, so Galey and her team return to tackle their kids rooms.

programme.title: House Hunters S189 Ep9
programme.desc: Spender Versus Saver In Nashville - Newlyweds hunt for a home in Nashville with space to grow. She wants a brick property in the suburbs, but he wants to be near downtown.

programme.title: House Hunters International S138 Ep4
programme.desc: Family Democracy In Noosa - A couple who honeymooned in Noosa, Australia, 17 years ago is ready to make a permanent move Down Under from Switzerland.

programme.title: House Hunters International S142 Ep8
programme.desc: Hitting Reset In Costa Rica - A couple with hectic careers and three kids look to slow down in Tamarindo, Costa Rica.

programme.title: House Hunters International S138 Ep5
programme.desc: A Crawley Country Mile - American Grace and Londoner Kris have had a whirlwind long-distance relationship. Now they're married and moving to quiet Crawley, England, to start a life together.

programme.title: Kendra Sells Hollywood S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Business Or Pleasure - Kendra is offered a trial period with a real estate firm. Plus, she can't tell if one of her leads is strictly professional or has romantic intentions.

programme.title: House Hunters International S138 Ep8
programme.desc: Adulting In Amsterdam - A young woman has always wanted to live in Europe, and an unexpected job opportunity for her boyfriend in Amsterdam is making her dream come true.

programme.title: House Hunters S189 Ep10
programme.desc: Town Or Country In Cincinnati - Newlyweds are keen to get out of her parents' house and into their own home. However, this country boy and this city girl have different priorities.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S7 Ep10
programme.desc: Newlywed Millionaires - Newlyweds search Columbus, OH, for a dream home where they can raise a family after becoming instant millionaires.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Everyone Loves A Ray Romano Renovation - Ray Romano teams up with Jonathan and Drew to gift his friend and assistant of 23 years with a spa-like upgrade to her main suite.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep71
programme.desc: One More Cup, Part 2 - King Julien discovers tea which becomes a huge hit throughout the kingdom but when Karls brother Bruce invites him to his coffee corporation trouble start to brew

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep70
programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep69
programme.desc: Tears In The Drain - When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep68
programme.desc: Night Creatures - King Julien cant sleep so he decides to go on a milk cleanse to help but after Todd is attacked by a horrible monster King Juliens nightmares cause the kingdom to question him as...THE NIGHT CREATURE

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep67
programme.desc: Spin Cycle - When a segment on Xixis show changes the kingdom Julien begins scheming ways to use the influence of the show to his advantage and creates a Juliencentric propaganda machine

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep66
programme.desc: Julien 2.0 - King Julien wants a doover to become King JULIEN 2.0 and actually listen to his people. But when everyone feels their voice is the most important the kingdom becomes a chaotic mess

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep21
programme.desc: Lucky And The Impatient Patient - While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep22
programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise / Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come / Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedians disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End of the Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep60
programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 1 - Hiccup and the riders are on the run from the Flyers, but when they return to Berk, where Stoick is preparing for war, Hiccup is torn between his desire to get the Edge back and his unwillingness to fire on dragons

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep68
programme.desc: The Prisoner's Dilemma - After taking out an enemy military base, the Paladins, offer to make peace by answering a Galra distress call, only to discover a powerful enemy from Keiths past.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep15
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Two - A video of Rocky and Bullwinkle playing a song goes viral and theyre rocketed to musical superstardom. They decide to use their newfound celebrity to launch a save the birdbath concert tour to restore the giant birdbath they destroyed.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep16
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Three - Rocky, Bullwinkle, Boris and Natasha are kidnapped by a super-fan named Francis, the eight-year-old heir to the Puffy Platypus Pizza franchise, to play a private concert for his birthday.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep17
programme.desc: World Records/Hotu Matu'a - Sherman tries to set a world record - live on the show - but after failing each time, Peabody shows him that he did set a world record after all

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep18
programme.desc: Sherman From A To Zzzz/Akashi Shiganosuke - When Sherman hasn't slept in days because of a recurring nightmare, he causes mayhem on the set and Peabody must help Sherman confront his fears

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep27
programme.desc: The Ripening / Maraca Rock - Berrys family invites Berry to their annual celebration, which Berry finds tedious, but the Mighty Ones are excited to join in. / Rocksy swaps lives with a maraca bead for the day.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep28
programme.desc: Big Busyness / Foam Party - When Leaf meets an ambitious Coffee Bean, he learns the highs and lows of business. / Everyone is mad at Rocksy so she tries to make it up to them by creating fun foam for them to play in. But when they get preoccupied and forget about Rocksy, its her turn to become mad at them.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep34
programme.desc: A Welsh Trick & Treat - Its Halloween time and the Wanderers get a WanderPost from Odlulu issuing a challenge: Come to my Haunted House in Wales if you dare! Wally and Wenda, arent scared by Odlulu and Fritzs attempt at creating a haunted house with goofy Halloween decorations. So Odlulu uses the magical Haunted House Key to bring a few of the decorations to life.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep19
programme.desc: The Zippleback Experience - After heroes Hiccup and Toothless save Barf and Belch's life, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt and abandons riders Ruff and Tuff

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep20
programme.desc: Snow Way Out - Determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, Ryker heads to Glacier Island to find the dangerous Snow Wraith being protected by the Dragon Riders

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep19
programme.desc: FOMO-OPUP / Lost in the Woods - Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep73
programme.desc: Blackboard Jungle - King Julien organizes an Academic Bowl to prove the lemurs are the smartest on the island

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep2
programme.desc: Poll Position - King Julien learns that 99% of the lemurs love him, so he makes it his mission to find and convert his one "hater."

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep1
programme.desc: King Me - Uncle King Julien abdicates his throne, handing off his crown to Prince Julien. Let the reign of King Julien the Thirteenth begin.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep78
programme.desc: The End Is Here - When King Julien and the gang bury Sage for his bachelor party, things don't go according to plan and they must deal with Franken-Sage!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep77
programme.desc: The End Is Near - When King Julien learns that Clover may marry Sage, he sets out to prepare the kingdom for post-Clover attacks

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep76
programme.desc: King Julien Is Watching You - King Julien discovers surveillance equipment and installs it all over the kingdom

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep75
programme.desc: Karl-Mageddon - In honor of his retirement, Karl hosts an elaborate contest to find his successor who will become Madagascars next super villain

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep74
programme.desc: Lord Of The Fruit Flies - King Julien tries to rig an election so that Maurice becomes Mango Prime Minister but soon realizes his opponent Mort has a better shot than everyone thinks

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs / I Think We're Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;hes forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep61
programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 2 - When Stoick decides to take the battle on the Dragon Flyers to the Edge, the Riders must figure out how to trap the Flyers and take back the Edge

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep61
programme.desc: I Am Fartacus - King Julien & Maurice pose as Foosa and fight their way to Koto's wedding; Sage & Clover are captured by Koto; Mort heads to the Mortverse

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep69
programme.desc: Battle Scars - The Paladins attempt to uncover Honervas plans by returning to Olkarion. They get more than they bargained for when a Weblum targets the planet as its next meal.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep70
programme.desc: The Grudge - On their way back to reconvene with the Atlas, the Lions are ambushed by a mysterious masked figure while the Atlas races to rescue them.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep17
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Four - Rocky and Bullwinkle return to Frostbite Falls to discover that because they failed to rebuild the giant birdbath, their beloved town is now completely overrun with dirty, zombie-like birds.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep18
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter One - While celebrating their friend-iversary at their favorite restaurant, Long Tom Lobsters, Rocky and Bullwinkle solve a seemingly impossible maze on the kids menu.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep19
programme.desc: Orchoptitron In Love/John Harrington - When Orchoptitron breaks up with his love - the toaster oven - Peabody and Sherman take it upon themselves to cheer him up by playing The Data Game

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep20
programme.desc: Inside Hobson/Annie Oakley - When Hobson's invention goes haywire, he shrinks - and swallows - Sherman so Peabody must travel through Hobson's body to save him while hosting show

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep29
programme.desc: The Night Pig / Twigula - Kensington is terrorized by her overactive imagination when a possum comes into the yard and tangles with the Mighty Ones. / Berry mistakenly thinks that Twig is a juice sucker (like vampires for berries) and tries to convince him to make her into one too.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep30
programme.desc: Mystery! On the Yard Express / Lindsay Joins the Band - While passengers on board a fancy train, the Mighty Ones become a part of a classic whodunit. / With an impending visit from Brehts mother, Lindsay discovers she has more fun with her next door neighbors.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep35
programme.desc: Uh-Oh, Canada - The Wanderers and Whitebeard visit Wizard Blizzardbeard in Quebec City, Canada, for the big Wanderers Ice Hockey Tournament. When Odlulu uses the Invisibility Key on herself and Fritz, they become an unstoppable, invisible hockey-playing duo. Wally and Wenda must pursue Odlulu on the rink and throughout Quebec City to retrieve the Invisibility Key.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep242
programme.desc: Granny and Granpa's Attic - Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Magenta's Case of the Giggles - Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one 'patient' seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1004
programme.desc: Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub / Pups Save a Drive-in - When a storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest, and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family. // The Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Secret Island / Astrobot - Lady Fluffpot visits a secret island with Steel to find a birthday present from her cousin Adventure Alex. // Muffin's plan to get Dinobot into trouble goes disastrously wrong when the pair get trapped with Lola in an out-of-control Space Shuttle.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1005
programme.desc: Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends / Pups Save the Rainbow - The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. // In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color. It's up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Dad's Day Off / Scout's Honor / The Magic Word - Bossy and Bissy run errands with Dad. // Bossy and Turtle learn its okay to ask for help. // Bossy and Turtle learn about the word "please".

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island / The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelles tent

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep249
programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppas house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Race to the Golden Gift - Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, its a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep117

programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Muddy Puddles - It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.desc: Best Friend - Peppa Pig's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes over to visit.

programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crystal Of Strength / Clamity - Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep913
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Mighty Eel - When an eel accidentally swallows a piece of the meteor and becomes gigantic, it's up to the Mighty Pups to save Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubbles dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundos dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Birthdaze / Squid N' Playl / Board to Tears - Bossy comes up with a plan to celebrate his birthday every day. // Bossy and Turtle invite Saddiq to take part in International Bestie Day traditions. // When Turtle gets a new skateboard, he's too scared to use it when Bossy has an accident.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Golden Giant - When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Mummy Pig at Work - Peppa accidentally crashes Mummy Pig's computer, so Daddy Pig tries to fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Piggy in the Middle - Peppa teaches George how to catch a ball, and later, they play Monkey in the Middle with Mummy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Daddy Loses his Glasses - Daddy Pig is a little upset because he lost his glasses, so Peppa and George try to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Gardening - Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Hiccups - George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze - When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become: Special Mission Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep617
programme.desc: The Snow Spectacular - Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny X / Pups in a Fix - Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue. // RoboDogs wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and wont let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.desc: Bad Hank - When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy just like Shadow.

programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep618

programme.desc: The Pirate Party / Dr. Abuela - When Pepito magically gifts Escarlata legs, she finally gets the chance to crash her first Larimar party! // When Barbarito steals Doctora Abuela's ship and traps Santi and his crew, Tina and Abuela must save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pick and Chew / Mr. Bossy and Mr. Turtle / Dance Like Everyone's Watching - Bossy, Turtle and Bissy are overwhelmed when Mom and Dad let them order at a pizza place. // Miss Elky lets Bossy and Turtle take over for the day. // Turtle is afraid to dance in front of a huge crowd.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a gift to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep913
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floating Royal Carriage - After Sweetie decides to commandeer the Princess's royal carriage and horses, Sid the pirate sends Arrby to steal it.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Secrets - Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Polly Parrot - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house, and meet their new parrot, Polly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Peppa and George decide to play a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Playgroup - Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - The squirrels make new friends, play games and have a picnic at a Jamboree. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The River Badge - Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat! Good job Duggee has his River badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - The squirrels are all hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Salmon Run, Alaska - Alaska's a cool place to watch the salmon run, but Glitch opens a 'fishy taxi service' to help the salmon avoid tricky waterfalls and greedy bears. What could possibly go wrong?
